## Tutorials Delivered

::: {style="text-align:justify;"}
During my time at the Federal University of Lavras (UFLA), I had the opportunity to deliver several tutorials and seminars in Portuguese (BR), including the following:
:::

::: {style="text-align:justify;"}
-   [**Introduction to Python Course:**](https://github.com/MyrOak/Introduction-to-Py) Covered the fundamentals of the language, from basic concepts to essential libraries.
:::

::: {style="text-align:justify;"}
-   [**Introduction to R**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5HXcNnFK9QQ) Covered the fundamentals of the language, from basic concepts to essential libraries. This tutorial is planned in two parts. I present the first part here. You can find more on the [YouTube channel of the Department of Statistics](https://www.youtube.com/@departamentodeestatisticau1017/streams) at UFLA.
:::
